1: -module(doc_html_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: %% callbacks
    4: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
    5: 
    6: %% test format
    7: -export([convert_erlang_html/1, convert_unknown_format/1]).
    8: 
    9: %% test non-existing moduledoc
   10: -export([non_existing_moduledoc/1,hidden_moduledoc/1,existing_moduledoc/1]).
   11: 
   12: %% test non-existing docs
   13: -export([non_existing_doc/1, hidden_doc/1, existing_doc/1]).
   14: 
   15: %% headings
   16: -export([h1_test/1, h2_test/1, h3_test/1, h4_test/1, h5_test/1, h6_test/1]).
   17: 
   18: %% quotes
   19: -export([single_line_quote_test/1, double_char_for_quote_test/1,
   20:          ignore_three_spaces_before_quote/1, multiple_line_quote_test/1,
   21:          paragraph_in_between_test/1]).
   22: 
   23: %% paragraph
   24: -export([paragraph_after_heading_test/1, quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test/1]).
   25: 
   26: %% inline code
   27: -export([single_line_code_test/1, multiple_line_code_test/1, paragraph_between_code_test/1]).
   28: 
   29: %% fence code
   30: -export([single_line_fence_code_test/1, multiple_line_fence_code_test/1, paragraph_between_fence_code_test/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% br
   33: -export([start_with_br_test/1, multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test/1,
   34:          multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test/1, ending_br_test/1]).
   35: 
   36: %% Comments
   37: -export([begin_comment_test/1, after_paragraph_comment/1, forget_closing_comment/1 ]).
   38: 
   39: %% Format
   40: -export([format_heading_test/1, format_paragraph_test/1, format_multiple_inline/1,
   41:          format_multiple_inline_format_short/1, format_multiple_inline_format_long/1,
   42:          format_multiple_inline_format_mixed/1, unmatched_format_simple/1,
   43:          unmatched_format_with_inline/1, unmatched_complex_format_with_inline/1,
   44:          format_inline_link_with_inline/1, complex_inline_format/1, skip_symbols_in_inline/1]).
   45: 
   46: %% Bullet lists
   47: -export([singleton_bullet_list/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_with_format/1,
   48:          singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1, singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1,
   49:          multiline_bullet_indented_list/1, multiline_bullet_indented_list2/1,
   50:          multiline_bullet_list/1, even_nested_bullet_list/1, odd_nested_bullet_list/1,
   51:          complex_nested_bullet_list/1, complex_nested_bullet_list2/1]).
   52: 
   53: %% Numbered lists
   54: -export([singleton_numbered_list/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph/1,
   55:          singleton_numbered_list_with_format/1, singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph/1,
   56:          singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2/1, multiline_numbered_indented_list/1,
   57:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2/1, multiline_numbered_list/1, even_nested_numbered_list/1,
   58:       odd_nested_numbered_list/1]).
   59: 
   60: -define(ERLANG_HTML, <<"application/erlang+html">>).
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
   64: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   65: 
   66: 
   67: -define(EXPECTED_FUN(Expected), {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Expected, #{}}).
   68: 
   69: all() ->
   70:     [{group, different_format_generator},
   71:      {group, module_generator},
   72:      {group, doc_generator},
   73:      {group, header_generator},
   74:      {group, quote_generator},
   75:      {group, paragraph_generator},
   76:      {group, code_generator},
   77:      {group, fence_code_generator},
   78:      {group, br_generator},
   79:      {group, comment_generator},
   80:      {group, format_generator},
   81:      {group, bullet_list_generator},
   82:      {group, numbered_list_generator}
   83:     ].
   84: 
   85: groups() ->
   86:     [{different_format_generator, [parallel], different_format_conversion_tests()},
   87:      {module_generator, [sequence], moduledoc_tests()},
   88:      {doc_generator, [parallel], doc_tests()},
   89:      {header_generator, [parallel], header_tests()},
   90:      {quote_generator, [parallel], quote_tests()},
   91:      {paragraph_generator, [parallel], paragraph_tests()},
   92:      {code_generator, [parallel], code_tests()},
   93:      {fence_code_generator, [parallel], fence_code_tests()},
   94:      {br_generator, [parallel], br_tests()},
   95:      {comment_generator, [parallel], comment_tests()},
   96:      {format_generator, [parallel], format_tests()},
   97:      {bullet_list_generator, [parallel], bullet_list_tests()},
   98:      {numbered_list_generator, [parallel], numbered_list_tests()}
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  102:     Config.
  103: 
  104: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  105:     ok.
  106: 
  107: different_format_conversion_tests() ->
  108:     [ convert_erlang_html,
  109:       convert_unknown_format
  110:     ].
  111: 
  112: moduledoc_tests() ->
  113:     [ non_existing_moduledoc,
  114:       hidden_moduledoc,
  115:       existing_moduledoc
  116:     ].
  117: 
  118: doc_tests() ->
  119:     [ non_existing_doc,
  120:       hidden_doc,
  121:       existing_doc
  122:     ].
  123: 
  124: header_tests() ->
  125:     [ h1_test,
  126:       h2_test,
  127:       h3_test,
  128:       h4_test,
  129:       h5_test,
  130:       h6_test
  131:     ].
  132: 
  133: quote_tests() ->
  134:     [ single_line_quote_test,
  135:       double_char_for_quote_test,
  136:       ignore_three_spaces_before_quote,
  137:       multiple_line_quote_test,
  138:       paragraph_in_between_test
  139:     ].
  140: 
  141: paragraph_tests() ->
  142:     [ paragraph_after_heading_test,
  143:       quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test
  144:     ].
  145: 
  146: code_tests() ->
  147:     [ single_line_code_test,
  148:       multiple_line_code_test,
  149:       paragraph_between_code_test
  150:     ].
  151: 
  152: fence_code_tests() ->
  153:   [single_line_fence_code_test,
  154:    multiple_line_fence_code_test,
  155:    paragraph_between_fence_code_test
  156:   ].
  157: 
  158: br_tests() ->
  159:     [ start_with_br_test,
  160:       multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test,
  161:       multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test,
  162:       ending_br_test
  163:     ].
  164: 
  165: comment_tests() ->
  166:     [ begin_comment_test,
  167:       after_paragraph_comment,
  168:       forget_closing_comment
  169:     ].
  170: 
  171: format_tests() ->
  172:     [ format_heading_test,
  173:       format_paragraph_test,
  174:       format_multiple_inline,
  175:       format_multiple_inline_format_long,
  176:       format_multiple_inline_format_short,
  177:       format_multiple_inline_format_mixed,
  178:       unmatched_format_simple,
  179:       unmatched_format_with_inline,
  180:       unmatched_complex_format_with_inline,
  181:       format_inline_link_with_inline,
  182:       complex_inline_format,
  183:       skip_symbols_in_inline
  184:     ].
  185: 
  186: bullet_list_tests() ->
  187:     [ singleton_bullet_list,
  188:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  189:       singleton_bullet_list_with_format,
  190:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  191:       singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  192:       multiline_bullet_indented_list,
  193:       multiline_bullet_indented_list2,
  194:       multiline_bullet_list,
  195:       even_nested_bullet_list,
  196:       odd_nested_bullet_list,
  197:       complex_nested_bullet_list,
  198:       complex_nested_bullet_list2
  199:     ].
  200: 
  201: numbered_list_tests() ->
  202:     [ singleton_numbered_list,
  203:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_new_paragraph,
  204:       singleton_numbered_list_with_format,
  205:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph,
  206:       singleton_numbered_list_followed_inner_paragraph2,
  207:       multiline_numbered_indented_list,
  208:       multiline_numbered_indented_list2,
  209:       multiline_numbered_list,
  210:       even_nested_numbered_list,
  211:       odd_nested_numbered_list
  212:     ].
  213: 
  214: convert_erlang_html(_Conf) ->
  215:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => [{p, [], [<<"Test">>]}]},
  216:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}}],
  217: 
  218:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, ?ERLANG_HTML, none, #{}, Functions),
  219:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  220:     ok = shell_docs:validate(Docs),
  221:     ok.
  222: 
  223: convert_unknown_format(_Conf) ->
  224:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"<text>Here</text>">>},
  225:     Functions = create_fun(Doc),
  226: 
  227:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"xml">>, Doc, #{},Functions),
  228:     Docs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  229:     ok.
  230: 
  231: non_existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  232:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, []),
  233:     _ = compile(Docs),
  234:     ok.
  235: 
  236: hidden_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  237:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, hidden, #{}, []),
  238:     _ = compile(Docs),
  239:     ok.
  240: 
  241: existing_moduledoc(_Conf) ->
  242:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  243:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  244:     #{<<"en">> := HtmlModDoc} = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  245:     H1 = header(1, <<"Here">>),
  246:     [H1] = HtmlModDoc,
  247:     ok.
  248: 
  249: non_existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  250:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(none)),
  251:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  252:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  253:     ok.
  254: 
  255: hidden_doc(_Conf) ->
  256:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{}, create_fun(hidden)),
  257:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  258:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  259:     ok.
  260: 
  261: existing_doc(_Conf) ->
  262:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{},
  263:                         create_fun(#{<<"en">> => <<"Test">>})),
  264:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  265:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  266:     ok.
  267: 
  268: h1_test(_Conf) ->
  269:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here">>),
  270:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  271: 
  272:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [header(1, <<"Here">>)]},
  273:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  274:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  275:     ok.
  276: 
  277: h2_test(_Conf) ->
  278:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n## Header 2">>),
  279:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  280: 
  281:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h2, [], [<<"Header 2">>]}]},
  282:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  283:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  284:     ok.
  285: 
  286: h3_test(_Conf) ->
  287:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n### Header 3">>),
  288:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  289: 
  290:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h1, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h3, [], [<<"Header 3">>]}]},
  291:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  292:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  293:     ok.
  294: 
  295: h4_test(_Conf) ->
  296:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"### Here\n#### Header 4">>),
  297:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  298: 
  299:     Expected = #{<<"en">> => [{h3, [], [<<"Here">>]}, {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]}]},
  300:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  301:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  302:     ok.
  303: 
  304: h5_test(_Conf) ->
  305:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  306:     DocH5 = #{<<"en">> => <<"##### H5">>},
  307:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  308:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH5, #{}}],
  309:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  310: 
  311:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  312:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  313:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  314:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  315:     ExpectedH5 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]} ]},
  316:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  317:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  318:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  319:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH5, #{}} = E2,
  320:     ok.
  321: 
  322: h6_test(_Conf) ->
  323:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"### Here\n#### Header 4\n##### H5">>},
  324:     DocH6 = #{<<"en">> => <<"###### H6\n## H2">>},
  325:     Functions = [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Doc, #{}},
  326:                  {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], DocH6, #{}}],
  327:     Docs = create_eep48(erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, Doc, #{}, Functions),
  328: 
  329:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  330:     ExpectedH3 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h3, [], [<<"Here">>]},
  331:                                  {h4, [], [<<"Header 4">>]},
  332:                                  {h5, [], [<<"H5">>]}]},
  333:     ExpectedH6 = #{<<"en">> => [ {h6, [], [<<"H6">>]},
  334:                                  {h2, [], [<<"H2">>]} ]},
  335:     ExpectedH3 = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  336:     [ E1, E2 ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  337:     {{function, foo, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH3, #{}} = E1,
  338:     {{function, bar, 0}, [], [], ExpectedH6, #{}} = E2,
  339:     ok.
  340: 
  341: 
  342: single_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  343:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  344:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  345: 
  346:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  347:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  348:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  349:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  350:     ok.
  351: 
  352: double_char_for_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  353:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n>> This is a quote">>),
  354:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  355: 
  356:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  357:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  358:                           quote(<<"\n">>),
  359:                           quote(<<"This is a quote">>)]),
  360:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  361:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: ignore_three_spaces_before_quote(_Conf) ->
  365:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"   > # Here">>),
  366:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  367: 
  368:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here">>)),
  369:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  370:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  371:     ok.
  372: 
  373: multiple_line_quote_test(_Conf) ->
  374:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> # Here\n> This is a quote">>),
  375:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  376: 
  377:     Expected = expected(quote(<<"# Here\nThis is a quote">>)),
  378:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  379:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  380:     ok.
  381: 
  382: paragraph_in_between_test(_Conf) ->
  383:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n> A quote\n## Header 2\nBody content">>),
  384:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  385: 
  386:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  387:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  388:                           quote(<<"A quote">>),
  389:                           header(2, <<"Header 2">>),
  390:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  391:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  392:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  393:     ok.
  394: 
  395: paragraph_after_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  396:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Header 1\nThis is text\n\nBody content">>),
  397:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  398: 
  399:     Expected = #{<<"en">> =>
  400:                      [ header(1, <<"Header 1">>),
  401:                        p(<<"This is text">>),
  402:                        p(<<"Body content">>)]},
  403:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  404:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  405:     ok.
  406: 
  407: quote_before_and_after_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  408:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"> Quote 1\nThis is text\n> Quote 2\nBody content">>),
  409:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  410: 
  411:     Expected = expected([ quote(<<"Quote 1">>),
  412:                           p(<<"This is text">>),
  413:                           quote(<<"Quote 2">>),
  414:                           p(<<"Body content">>)]),
  415:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  416:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  417:     ok.
  418: 
  419: single_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  420:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# Here\n    This is code">>),
  421:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  422: 
  423:     Expected = expected([ header(1, <<"Here">>),
  424:                           code(<<"This is code">>)]),
  425:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  426:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  427:     ok.
  428: 
  429: multiple_line_code_test(_Conf) ->
  430:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"    # Here\n    This is code\n        Nested Line">>),
  431:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  432: 
  433:     Expected = expected(code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>)),
  434:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  435:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  436:     ok.
  437: 
  438: paragraph_between_code_test(_Conf) ->
  439:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a paragraph\n",
  440:                               "\n",
  441:                               "    # Here\n",
  442:                               "    This is code\n",
  443:                               "        Nested Line\n",
  444:                               "Another paragraph">>),
  445:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  446: 
  447:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"This is a paragraph">>),
  448:                           code(<<"# Here\nThis is code\n    Nested Line">>),
  449:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  450:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  451:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  452:     ok.
  453: 
  454: single_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  455:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  456: ```erlang
  457: test() -> ok.
  458: ```">>),
  459:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  460:     Expected = expected([ code(<<"test() -> ok.">>)]),
  461:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  462:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  463:     ok.
  464: 
  465: multiple_line_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  466:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  467: ```erlang
  468: test() ->
  469:   ok.
  470: ```">>),
  471:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  472:     Expected = expected([ code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  473:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  474:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  475:     ok.
  476: 
  477: 
  478: paragraph_between_fence_code_test(_Conf) ->
  479:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"This is a test:
  480: ```erlang
  481: test() ->
  482:   ok.
  483: ```">>),
  484:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  485:     Expected = expected([p(<<"This is a test:">>),
  486:                          code(<<"test() ->\n  ok.">>)]),
  487:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  488:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  489:     ok.
  490: 
  491: 
  492: start_with_br_test(_Conf) ->
  493:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  494:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  495:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  496:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  497:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  498:     ok.
  499: 
  500: multiple_br_followed_by_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  501:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"\nAnother paragraph\n\nAnother paragraph">>),
  502:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  503:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Another paragraph">>),
  504:                           p(<<"Another paragraph">>)]),
  505:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  506:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  507:     ok.
  508: 
  509: multiple_lines_of_a_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  510:   Text = """
  511: Returns a new list `List3`, which is made from the elements of `List1` followed
  512: by the elements of `List2`.
  513: """,
  514:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(list_to_binary(Text)),
  515:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  516:     Expected = expected([p([<<"Returns a new list ">>,
  517:                             inline_code(<<"List3">>),
  518:                             <<", which is made from the elements of ">>,
  519:                             inline_code(<<"List1">>), <<" followed">>,
  520:                             <<"\nby the elements of ">>,
  521:                             inline_code(<<"List2">>), <<".">>])]),
  522:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  523:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  524:     ok.
  525: 
  526: ending_br_test(_Conf) ->
  527:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n">>),
  528:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  529:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>)]),
  530:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  531:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  532:     ok.
  533: 
  534: begin_comment_test(_Conf) ->
  535:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  536:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  537:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>)]),
  538:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  539:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  540:     ok.
  541: 
  542: after_paragraph_comment(_Conf) ->
  543:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore -->Test">>),
  544:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  545:     Expected = expected([ p(<<"Test">>), p(<<"Test">>)]),
  546:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  547:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  548:     ok.
  549: 
  550: forget_closing_comment(_Conf) ->
  551:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"Test\n<!-- Ignore Test">>),
  552:     {'EXIT', {missing_close_comment, _}} = catch compile(Docs),
  553:     ok.
  554: 
  555: format_heading_test(_Conf) ->
  556:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"# **H1**\n## _H2_\n### `H3`">>),
  557:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  558:     Expected = expected([ header(1, em(<<"H1">>)),
  559:                           header(2, it(<<"H2">>)),
  560:                           header(3, inline_code(<<"H3">>))
  561:                         ]),
  562:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  563:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  564:     ok.
  565: 
  566: format_paragraph_test(_Conf) ->
  567:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1** *HH* _H2_ __H3__ `code`">>),
  568:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  569:     Expected = expected([ p([ em(<<"H1">>),
  570:                               <<" ">>,
  571:                               it(<<"HH">>),
  572:                               <<" ">>,
  573:                               it(<<"H2">>),
  574:                               <<" ">>,
  575:                               em(<<"H3">>),
  576:                               <<" ">>,
  577:                               inline_code(<<"code">>)
  578:                             ])
  579:                         ]),
  580:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  581:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  582:     ok.
  583: 
  584: format_multiple_inline(_Conf) ->
  585:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 *HH***">>),
  586:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  587:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  588:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  589:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  590:     ok.
  591: 
  592: format_multiple_inline_format_long(_Conf) ->
  593:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**H1 __HH__**">>),
  594:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  595:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, em(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  596:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  597:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  598:     ok.
  599: 
  600: format_multiple_inline_format_short(_Conf) ->
  601:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"_H1 *HH*_">>),
  602:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  603:     Expected = expected([ p([ it([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>)])]) ]),
  604:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  605:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  606:     ok.
  607: 
  608: format_multiple_inline_format_mixed(_Conf) ->
  609:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**__ _there_">>),
  610:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  611:     Expected = expected([ p([ em([<<"H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>, em(<<"test2">>)]),
  612:                               <<" ">>,
  613:                               it(<<"there">>)])
  614:                         ]),
  615:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  616:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  617:     ok.
  618: 
  619: unmatched_format_simple(_Conf) ->
  620:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold*">>),
  621:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  622:     Expected = expected([ p([<<"**Bold*">> ])]),
  623:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  624:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  625: 
  626: unmatched_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  627:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**Bold *Italics*">>),
  628:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  629:     Expected = expected(p([<<"**Bold ">>, it(<<"Italics">>) ])),
  630:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  631:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs).
  632: 
  633: unmatched_complex_format_with_inline(_Conf) ->
  634:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"__H1 *HH* _test_ **test2**_ _there_">>),
  635:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  636:     Expected = expected([ p([ <<"__H1 ">>, it(<<"HH">>), <<" ">>, it(<<"test">>), <<" ">>,
  637:                               em(<<"test2">>),
  638:                               it(<<" ">>),
  639:                               <<"there_">>])
  640:                         ]),
  641:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  642:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  643:     ok.
  644: 
  645: format_inline_link_with_inline(_Config) ->
  646:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"[`splitwith/2`](`splitwith/2`) behaves as if">>),
  647:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  648:     Expected = expected([ p([inline_code(<<"splitwith/2">>),<<" behaves as if">>])]),
  649:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  650:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  651:     ok.
  652: 
  653: complex_inline_format(_Config) ->
  654:   %% The complexity here comes from the _, where the alg needs to backtrack
  655:   %% add the _ to an existing buffer, and continue where it left off using
  656:   %% any previous opening format characters, in this case **.
  657:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}`**">>),
  658:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  659:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{set_alarm, {AlarmId, AlarmDescr}}">>)))),
  660:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  661:   ok.
  662: 
  663: skip_symbols_in_inline(_Config) ->
  664:   Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"**`{the_beginning, the_end}`**">>),
  665:   HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  666:   Expected = expected(p(em(inline_code(<<"{the_beginning, the_end}">>)))),
  667:   [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  668:   ok.
  669: 
  670: 
  671: singleton_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  672:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner">>),
  673:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  674:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))])]),
  675:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  676:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  677:     ok.
  678: 
  679: singleton_bullet_list_followed_new_paragraph(_Config) ->
  680:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  681:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  682:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>))]), p(<<"This is a new paragraph">>)]),
  683:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  684:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  685:     ok.
  686: 
  687: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph(_Config) ->
  688:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  This is a new paragraph">>),
  689:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  690:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  691:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  692:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  693:     ok.
  694: 
  695: singleton_bullet_list_followed_inner_paragraph2(_Config) ->
  696:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\nThis is a new paragraph">>),
  697:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  698:     Expected = expected([ul([li([p([<<"One liner">>, <<"This is a new paragraph">>])])])]),
  699:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  700:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  701:     ok.
  702: 
  703: 
  704: singleton_bullet_list_with_format(_Config) ->
  705:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* *One* __liner__">>),
  706:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  707:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p([it(<<"One">>), <<" ">>,  em(<<"liner">>)]))])]),
  708:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  709:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  710:     ok.
  711: 
  712: multiline_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  713:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n* Second line">>),
  714:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),

  716:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  717:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  718:     ok.

  724:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),

  727:     ok.

  730:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(
  731:              <<"  * _One liner_\n  * _Second_ `line`">>),
  732:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  733:     Expected = expected([ul([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  734:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))])]),
  735:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  736:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  737:     ok.
  738: 
  739: even_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  740:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n  * Second nested line">>),
  741:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  742:     Expected = expected([ul([
  743:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  744:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  745:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>))
  746:                                      ])
  747:                                 ])
  748:                             ])]),
  749:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  750:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  751:     ok.
  752:

  755:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  756:     Expected = expected([ul([
  757:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  758:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  759:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  760:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  761:                                      ])
  762:                                 ])
  763:                             ])]),
  764:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  765:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  766:     ok.
  767: 
  768: complex_nested_bullet_list(_Config) ->
  769:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"* One liner\n  * First nested line\n* Second line">>),
  770:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  771:     Expected = expected([ul([
  772:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  773:                                   ul([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)) ])
  774:                                 ]),
  775:                              li([p(<<"Second line">>)])
  776:                             ])]),
  777:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  778:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  779:     ok.
  780: 
  781: complex_nested_bullet_list2(_Config) ->
  782:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"
  783: * One liner
  784:   * First nested line
  785:     * Second level nested line
  786:   * Second nested line
  787:     * Another nested line
  788: * Second one liner">>),
  789:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  790:     Expected = expected([ul([
  791:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  792:                                   ul([ li([
  793:                                            p(<<"First nested line">>),
  794:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Second level nested line">>)])])
  795:                                           ]),
  796:                                        li([
  797:                                            p(<<"Second nested line">>),
  798:                                            ul([ li([p(<<"Another nested line">>)])])
  799:                                           ])
  800:                                      ])
  801:                                 ]),
  802:                              li([ p(<<"Second one liner">>)])
  803:                             ])]),
  804:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  805:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  806:     ok.
  807: 
  808: singleton_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  809:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner">>),
  810:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  811:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>))])]),
  812:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),

  814:     ok.

  850: multiline_numbered_indented_list(_Config) ->
  851:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"  1. One liner\n  2. Second line">>),
  852:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  853:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),
  854:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  855:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),

  858: multiline_numbered_indented_list2(_Config) ->

  860:              <<"  1. _One liner_\n  2. _Second_ `line`">>),
  861:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  862:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(it(<<"One liner">>))),
  863:                              li(p([it(<<"Second">>), <<" ">>,  inline_code(<<"line">>)]))])]),
  864:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  865:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  866:     ok.

  868: multiline_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  869:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n2. Second line">>),
  870:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  871:     Expected = expected([ol([li(p(<<"One liner">>)), li(p(<<"Second line">>))])]),

  874:     ok.
  875: 
  876: even_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  877:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line">>),
  878:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  879:     Expected = expected([ol([
  880:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  881:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  882:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>))
  883:                                      ])
  884:                                 ])
  885:                             ])]),
  886:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  887:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  888:     ok.
  889: 
  890: odd_nested_numbered_list(_Config) ->
  891:     Docs = create_eep48_doc(<<"1. One liner\n  1. First nested line\n  2. Second nested line\n  3. Third nested line">>),
  892:     HtmlDocs = compile(Docs),
  893:     Expected = expected([ol([
  894:                              li([ p(<<"One liner">>),
  895:                                   ol([ li(p(<<"First nested line">>)),
  896:                                        li(p(<<"Second nested line">>)),
  897:                                        li(p(<<"Third nested line">>))
  898:                                      ])
  899:                                 ])
  900:                             ])]),
  901:     Expected = extract_moduledoc(HtmlDocs),
  902:     [ ?EXPECTED_FUN(Expected) ] = extract_doc(HtmlDocs),
  903:     ok.
  904: 
  905: 
  906: header(Level, Text) when is_integer(Level) ->
  907:     HeadingLevel = integer_to_list(Level),
  908:     HeadingLevelAtom = list_to_existing_atom("h" ++ HeadingLevel),
  909:     {HeadingLevelAtom, [], [Text]}.
  910: 
  911: quote(X) ->
  912:     {pre,[],[{code,[],[X]}]}.
  913: 
  914: code(X) ->
  915:     {pre,[],[inline_code(X)]}.
  916: 
  917: inline_code(X) ->
  918:     {code,[],[X]}.
  919: 
  920: p(X) when is_list(X) ->
  921:     {p, [], X};
  922: p(X) when is_tuple(X); is_binary(X) ->
  923:     p([X]).
  924: 
  925: em(X) when is_list(X) ->
  926:     {em, [], X};
  927: em(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  928:     em([X]).
  929: 
  930: it(X) when is_list(X) ->
  931:     {i, [], X};
  932: it(X) when is_binary(X); is_tuple(X) ->
  933:     it([X]).
  934: 
  935: ul(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  936:     {ul, [], Items}.
  937: 
  938: ol(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  939:     {ol, [], Items}.
  940: 
  941: li(Item) when is_tuple(Item); is_binary(Item) ->
  942:     li([Item]);
  943: li(Items) when is_list(Items) ->
  944:     {li, [], Items}.
  945: 
  946: -spec create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) -> #docs_v1{} when
  947:       Language  :: atom(),
  948:       Mime      :: binary(),
  949:       ModuleDoc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  950:       Metadata  :: map(),
  951:       Docs      :: [{{Kind, Name, Arity},
  952:                      Anno :: erl_anno:anno(),
  953:                      Signature :: [binary()],
  954:                      Doc :: #{DocLanguage := DocValue} | none | hidden,
  955:                      Metadata :: map()
  956:                     }],
  957:       Kind      :: function | type | callback,
  958:       Name      :: atom(),
  959:       Arity     :: non_neg_integer(),
  960:       DocLanguage :: binary(),
  961:       DocValue :: binary() | term().
  962: create_eep48(Language, Mime, ModuleDoc, Metadata, Docs) ->
  963:     #docs_v1{anno = [],
  964:              beam_language = Language,
  965:              format = Mime,
  966:              module_doc = ModuleDoc,
  967:              metadata = maps:merge(#{ otp_doc_vsn => ?CURR_DOC_VERSION }, Metadata),
  968:              docs = Docs}.
  969: 
  970: extract_moduledoc(Docs) ->
  971:     Docs#docs_v1.module_doc.
  972: 
  973: extract_doc(Docs) ->
  974:     Docs#docs_v1.docs.
  975: 
  976: extract_format(Docs) ->
  977:     Docs#docs_v1.format.
  978: 
  979: create_eep48_doc(Doc) when is_binary(Doc) ->
  980:     create_eep48_doc(Doc, <<"text/markdown">>).
  981: 
  982: create_eep48_doc(Doc, Format) when is_binary(Doc) ->
  983:     Docs = #{<<"en">> => Doc},
  984:     create_eep48(erlang, Format, Docs, #{}, create_fun(Docs)).
  985: 
  986: create_fun(Docs) ->
  987:     [{{function, foo, 0}, [], [], Docs, #{}}].
  988: 
  989: 
  990: expected(X) when is_list(X)->
  991:     #{<<"en">> => X};
  992: expected(X) when is_tuple(X) ->
  993:     expected([X]).
  994: 
  995: compile(Docs) ->
  996:     HtmlDocs = doc_html:markdown_to_shelldoc(Docs),
  997:     ok = shell_docs:validate(HtmlDocs),
  998:     ?NATIVE_FORMAT = extract_format(HtmlDocs),
  999:     HtmlDocs.
